description:
King Cobra is surprised by seeing someone sitting on the Empty Throne and by learning about the truth of the world. When he is subject to a deadly attack, Sabo cuts in to save him. The injured king entrusts Sabo with a message.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die anvertraute Nachricht! – König Kobras Entschlossenheit
Takusareta Message! Cobra Ou no Kakugo
The Entrusted Message! King Cobra`s Resolve
Un message à transmettre. La détermination du roi Cobra !
الرّسالة المعهود بها! عزيمة الملك كوبرا!
託された伝言[メッセージ]! コブラ王の覚悟
